Business Term Name: Document level allowance VAT category code
Sum of Invoice line net amount

Value: Line that triggers creation of correction line

Business Term Name: Sum of Invoice line net amount
Calculations: Sum of "Invoice line net amount" (See BR-CO-10)
Sum of "Invoice line net amount" - Sum of allowances on document level + Sum of charges on document level (see BR-CO-13)
Sum of "VAT category tax amount" (See BR-CO-14)
Invoice total amount without VAT + "Invoice total VAT amount" (see BR-CO-15)
Invoice total VAT amount - "Paid amount" + “Rounding amount” (see BR-CO-16)
